Review Text: I'm hopelessly biased: once you get to know these characters, they could be solving the mystery of where Johnny left his lunchbox and I'd watch it with pleasure. Subtle acting, great locations and puzzling plots, with enough, but not too much, tension, and wry humor. Great entertainment, and even the morgue scenes are made bearable by the presence of a sweet pathologist!
